name: Zombies
description:
Zombies is a round based survival game focused on mowing down the undead and achieving the highest round.

With
  • 20+ Weapons to destroy the undead
  • 4 unique maps on base game
  • power-ups
  • plenty of relentless undead to mow down
  • An upgrade system spanding with 16 different options with upgrade option of thier own
  • An aboundence of character skins to choose from
